Text.content:
• Step 1. Open the demo application and try out the sort selection as well as the show more results button.
  • Step 2. See how the list looks like in the editable web view (requires login).
  • Step 3. Edit, delete, or add some contents here and track the changes in the demo application.
  • Step 4. From the web view, open the list configuration editor.
  • Step 5. Change the default sort order from date ascending to title ascending. Reload the demo application and see that the default sort order has changed.
